title: Solar panels on land used for biofuels could power all cars and trucks electric
full_text: Solar panels on land used for biofuels could power all cars and trucks electric. The world dedicates a Poland-sized area of land to liquid biofuels. Is there a more efficient way to generate energy?. Putting solar panels on land used for biofuels would produce enough electricity for all cars and trucks to go electric Electric vehicles might be promoted as the key technological solution for low-c… [+17742 chars]
